content: Apologies as this may be documented somewhere but I am having a hard time finding it. How are extensions on Extension.url element modeled in XML since url is a attribute on the Extension element instead of a child element. I see implementation in the JSON format in RI/JsonParser to parse _url in parseExtension but dont see any such implementation in XmlParser.
Don't think extension on an extension URL are supported (or should be). Same as extensions on element ids
Yeah but it's explicitly documented that Element.id shall not have extensions. I couldn't find any such statement for Extension.url
Probably should add such a rule. Can you submit a change request?
